C200.description: This required course for the Designated Emphasis in Development Engineering will  include projects and case studies, many related to projects at UC  Berkeley, such as those associated with the Development Impact Labs (DIL). Student teams will work with preliminary data to define the problem. They will then collect and analyze interview and survey data from potential users and begin to design a solution. Students will explore how to use novel monitoring technologies and “big data” for  product improvement and evaluation. The student teams will use the case studies (with improvements based on  user feedback and data analysis) to develop a plan for  scaling and evaluation with a rigorous controlled trial.
C200.title: Design, Evaluate, and Scale Development Technologies
